cards.title: San Cristóbal
cards.body: Walls around the magical town San Cristóbal de las Casas. The climbing is spectacular, with great variety, and all within a short drive from the city center.

cards.title: Cañón del Sumidero
cards.body: Cañón del Sumidero is a deep natural canyon located just east of the city of Tuxtla along the Río Grijalva. It offers big walls of up to 1000m in height.

cards.title: Paredes de Copoya
cards.body: Very sold limestone walls with a view of Tuxtla Gutiérrez. The walls are mostly north facing.

mission.title: our mission
mission.body: Vertigo is here to inspire the local, the travelling, the new, and the exsperianced. To come and climb!

mission.title: our essence
mission.body: At our core, Vertigo operates on being us out doors,  facing our fears, and becoming better climbers, and people.

mission.title: our vibe
mission.body: At Vertigo, we imagine climbing, we dream of climbing, and then go climbing together.  Enjoying the adventures the day will bring.

mission.title: our promise
mission.body: We deliver enthsiatic experiences, and  we can make the imposible possible.

bios.name: sofia
bios.body: After falling in love with climbing back in 2013 we wanted to help others in San Cristobal discover the beauty of these places.

bios.name: martin
bios.body: I’ve been climbing professionally since 2003, working and climbing around the world.  In Europe, and the Americas.

cards.title: Aguacero
cards.body: Once we arrive at Aguacero we will set up camp, and prepare for the rock climbing ahead. While you get a tour of the natural beauty.

cards.title: Day Trips
cards.body: The day trips are for participants with little, or no prior knowledge of outdoor climbing, as well as for experienced climbers.

cards.title: Advanced Climbing
cards.body: In this 4 day advanced rock climbing course, tailor made for each individual. unlock your full potential.

cards.title: Climbing Course
cards.body: In this 4 day course of outdoor instruction you will learn everything you need to know to climb safely and independently.

info.title: safety first
info.body: At Vertigo, we take yours, and our safety very seriously. If it’s your first day climbing, we will talk you though all the safety precautions, and equipment. The most dangerous part will be the bus to San Cristobal.

info.title: the enviroment
info.body: The places we go and climb of real natural beauty, we want to keep it that way, so we leave nothing but foot prints, and take nothing but memories, and photos.

info.title: What to bring
info.body: On your tour bring water, comfortable clothes for rock climbing, a warm jacket is advised, food, and a sense of adventure is essential! All equipment, and transport is provided.

ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.body: To make a booking, or to answer any questions, please feel free to get in touch. We will be happy to help.

aguacero.title: One Night Camping Aguacero
body: Natural park called 'The downpour', born in the El Encanto cave, where an underground river runs. It is a series of beautiful waterfalls that slope off in steps of several tens of meters on the walls of the Río La Venta Canyon
Once we arrive at Aguacero we will set up camp, and prepare for the rock climbing ahead. While we prepare things you are free to discover the natural beauty of the area.
After the climbing, we will camp for the night beside the river, cooking over an open flame, swimming, relaxing and enjoying the night.
aguacero.smallText: per person, two days, and one night.

daytrips.title: Sport Climbing Day Trips
body: The day trips are for participants with little, or no prior knowledge of outdoor climbing, as well as for experienced climbers. Together we will choose the place to go depending on your degree of experience, and the weather of the day.
We at the Vertigo Rock Climbing team, will place the safety equipment on the routes while you warm up, and enjoy the views so that you can then climb 100% safely, and enjoy the day.
The price includes climbing shoes, harness, helmet, rope, etc., transportation and trained guides. Not included is park entry fees if we go to Arcotete. Discounts for groups of more than 5 people.
daytrips.smallText: per person, full day. 9am until we are tired.

advanced.title: Advanced Rock Climbing
body: In this 4 day advanced rock climbing course, tailor made for each individual. unlock your full potential.
For people who already have experience in climbing but want to improve their performance. Learn how to face your fears, and we also give you individual exercises to progress efficiently.
We help you get out of your comfort zone! Personalized for each student.

rockclimbingcourse.title: Rock Climbing Course
body: In this 4 day course of outdoor instruction you will learn everything you need to know to climb safely and independently.

You'll learn the routines and habits that you must develop to climb safely, defining what equipment to use and how to prepare it for climbing, what actions we must do before climbing and what we should pay attention to when securing, and when climbing.
This course includes all equipment, certified guide and transportation to the different climbing sectors. No experience needed.
